qas.question: What is the name of the citys only lesbian owned LGBT magazine?
What year was the Rainbow Times founded?
What locations does the Rainbow Times serve?
Where is the headquarters for the Rainbow Times?

context: Various LGBT publications serve the city's large LGBT (lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender) community such as <a0_0>The Rainbow Times<a0_0/>, the only minority and lesbian-owned LGBT newsmagazine. Founded in <a1_0>2006<a1_0/>, The Rainbow Times is now based out of <a3_0>Boston<a3_0/>, but serves <a2_0>all of New England<a2_0/>.
